channel.title: How do i make ags hit high and more common on spec? [317]
channel.description:
hi guys i want to make my ags hit high on special, and hit it fairly often
i am using a 317 source, so yea any questions feel free to ask ;p
Thanks
question 1. ags spec - hi guys i want to make my ags hit high on special, and hit it fairly often
question 2. How do imake barrage hold for longer? thanks!

item.title: How do i make ags hit high and more common on spec? [317]
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“0mg Noob, post:3, topic:300234”]can you go on teamviewer and see if you can fix it? I’ve read what ya put with the whole

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == WEAPONIDGOESHERE && specialAmount <= 99) {//weapon name specialDamage = 95; specialDamage2 = 105; sendMessage("You do not have enough special energy left."); } if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == WEAPONIDGOESHERE && specialAmount >= 100) {//weapon name startAnimation(1658); specialDamage = 99 + misc.random(5); specialAmount -= 100; }
thing, but it doesnt seem to find ags id there…

Thanks anyway[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 05, 2009, 09:36:29 am[/size][hr]also, how do i make barrage hold for longer?[/quote]

Search for the barrage method (just keep searching barrage until you come something that looks right) and change the “freezeTimer” (I believe its that) to a higher number.
So like:

freezeTimer = 10;
freezeTimer = 20;

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make ags hit high and more common on spec? [317]
